mapper.sql: Cylinder_IDNum, Cylinder_Number, Cylinder_Code, Cylinder_QRCode, Company_Name, Cylinder_Spec, Cylinder_Pressure, Cylinder_Volume, Cylinder_MakeDate, Cylinder_Type, Cylinder_Media, Cylinder_Status, Cylinder_ScrapDate, Cylinder_Last_InspectDate, Cylinder_Next_InspectDate, Cylinder_Clinet, Property1, Property2, Remark, Use_Flag, Delete_Flag, Creation_Date, Created_By, Last_Update_Date, Last_Updated_By
mapper.insert:
insert into IMOS_TA_Cylinder
Cylinder_IDNum, Cylinder_Number, Cylinder_Code, Cylinder_QRCode, Company_Name, Cylinder_Spec, Cylinder_Pressure, Cylinder_Volume, Cylinder_MakeDate, Cylinder_Type, Cylinder_Media, Cylinder_Status, Cylinder_ScrapDate, Cylinder_Last_InspectDate, Cylinder_Next_InspectDate, Cylinder_Clinet, Property1, Property2, Remark, Use_Flag, Delete_Flag, Creation_Date, Created_By, Last_Update_Date, Last_Updated_By
values
#{CylinderIDNum, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cylinderNumber, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.delete:
update IMOS_TA_Cylinder set deleteFlag = 1, updateTime = GETDATE() where Cylinder_IDNum in
#{item}
mapper.select:
select
from IMOS_TA_Cylinder where Use_Flag = 1 and Delete_Flag != 1

select count(Cylinder_IDNum) c from IMOS_TA_Cylinder
and Cylinder_Number = #{cylinderNumber, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
